# HUD::SET_RADAR_ZOOM_TO_DISTANCE

## Summary
Zooms in/out to a distance in metres

## Parameters
* **FLOAT** distance

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Must be called every frame - keeps it locked to a blip
